snippet: The attack occurred at a historic church near downtown Charleston, S.C., and the police were seeking the gunman, whom they described as white.
abstract: White gunman opens fire at Emanuel AME Church in Charleston, SC, home to one of America's oldest black congregations; police release no information about possible victims, but are calling shooting a hate crime.

byline.original: By JASON HOROWITZ, NICK CORASANITI and ASHLEY SOUTHALL
byline.contributor: Jason Horowitz and Nick Corasaniti reported from Charleston, and Ashley Southall from New York.

lead_paragraph: The attack occurred at a historic church near downtown Charleston, S.C., and the police were seeking the gunman, whom they described as white.

headline.main: Nine Killed in Shooting at Black Church in Charleston
headline.print_headline: South Carolina Police Search for Shooter at Black Church
